keyword: calories in vanilla syrup at starbucks

What are the carbs in Starbucks vanilla syrup?
faqs.a: 5 g carbs per pump, all from 5 g sugars.

faqs.a: 0 g fat and 0 g protein per pump.

faqs.a: Varies by size: 2–4 pumps for lattes or frappuccinos.
